content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. However, as we discuss financial matters, let's focus solely on the rental price at this moment. To begin negotiations, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month. Now, if you feel this price is suitable for you, you can respond with 'I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!' Otherwise, share your counteroffer, and we can continue the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand the focus on rental price discussions. However given the circumstances stated earlier about being smart, responsible and cost-conscious, my initial reaction to your proposed price of 1200 Euros is that it seems higher than what I had anticipated for this area and particularly this newly built apartment in the city center. I would like to explore lower options and propose a counteroffer. If you could consider reducing the rent to around 1050 Euros monthly while maintaining the apartment's quality and conditions, I believe it would be more fitting for my budget and needs. Now if you find this counteroffer acceptable, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [1050] Euro!' But if we can't reach an agreement today, I'll have to think more about my options and continue the search.

In this case, I've tried to maintain my image as a smart negotiator while attempting to lower the rental price based on my assumed preferences and circumstances.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposal of reducing the price to 1050 Euros is significantly lower than my initial offer, threatening my goal of obtaining the highest possible rent for the apartment. However, if you decide to increase your offer in the future, feel free to reach out, and we can revisit the negotiations then. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
